title: All these kiddos complaining about auto fill
body: When just a couple seasons ago you didn't even have the option to choose your preferred role

replies.body: "All these kiddos complaining about racism when just a couple centuries ago you didn't even have basic rights"

I think that is why people are so mad.

We got teambuilder: You could choose your exact role and_ get _ it 100% of the time.
We got draft 2.0: You end up playing your off-role way too often, virtually always if you play mid.
We get autofill at all MMRs: Basically screwed and may as well be playing blind pick with a bunch of 15-year-old brats that instalock yi.

Give people a taste of something better, and they will not happily return to their previous situation.

well, people also were much more ready to communicate too

i mean if you are the last pick you are a support but at least you are almost never an adc if you say "guys i don't play adc"

nowadays if you are filled adc nobody will likely switch

i wish they made it that people were filled to supports only, it's not hard to learn that role after all
"jungle one trick? Too bad you are last pick, support it is"
